references.reason: This paper introduces Deep Canonical Correlation Analysis (DCCA), a core method in the paper and a baseline for comparison, making it highly influential to the research.
This paper introduces Deep Generalized Canonical Correlation Analysis (DGCCA), an extension of DCCA and also a baseline method used for comparison, highlighting its significance.
This paper is a foundational work in deep multi-view representation learning, with DCCA being a key method that the current paper builds upon and compares against.

references.paper_title: Multi-view representation learning via total correlation objective
references.reason: This paper proposes Multi-View Total Correlation Autoencoder (MVTCAE), used as a baseline for comparison, showing its relevance to the current research.

references.paper_title: Deep multi-view learning methods: A review
references.reason: This review paper provides a comprehensive overview of deep multi-view learning methods, setting the context and highlighting the importance of the current research in this area.
